casebody.data:
Richard M. JAMES, Appellant, v. UNITED STATES of America, Appellee. No. 14847. United States Court of Appeals District of Columbia Circuit. Argued June 26, 1959. Decided July 2, 1959. Mr. Richard A. Mehler, Washington, D. C. (appointed by this court) for appellant. Mr. Walter J. Bonner, Asst. U. S. Atty., with whom Messrs. Oliver Gasch, U. S. Atty., and Carl W. Belcher, Asst. U. S. Atty., were on the brief, for appel-lee.

Before Edgerton, Wilbur K. Miller, and Fahy, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

This appeal is from a conviction of robbery. We find no error.

Affirmed.
